<div class="col2">  

^19^ *mzỉ mz.w*  
*ḏd-mdw  *  
   
*ỉỉ.n zȝ-Rʿ  *  
*(tmdyns ḫwỉ)|  *  
*ḫr=k   *  
*ẖnmw-Rʿ nb tȝ-sn.t  *  
    
*dỉ=f n=k sḫ.t ḥtp.t  *  
*dỉ=f n=k sḫ.t wȝḏ.t  *  
*ḥtp=k ỉm  *  
*swȝš=k ỉm  *  
*wȝḏ=k ỉm  *  
*n ḏ.t-ḏ.t   *  
*ỉw=w wʿb.w zp-snw  *  

^19^ Presenting bouquets.  
Words spoken:  
  
The son of Re,  
(Domitian Augustus)|  
has come before you,  
Khnum-Re Lord of Esna,  
  
So he might give you a pleasant (*ḥtp.t*) field,  
and give you a green (*wȝḏ.t*) field.  
May you be pleased (*ḥtp*) therein,  
be powerful therein,  
and thrive (*wȝḏ*) therein,  
for all eternity,  
these (offerings) being pure!
